title: invalid pointer when running sync client 1.1.1 on linux x86_64
body:
the bug is, after running it for approx. 20 min:

glibc detected *** /usr/bin/owncloud: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fffd73cbb39 ***

this is the crashing source code line:

```
/usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/modules/csync_owncloud.c:1312

#4  0x00007fffce165d57 in owncloud_open (durl=0x7fffbca0da20 "ownclouds://my.server.com/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/markus_repo/scripts/backup_grass_mailman.sh", flags=<optimized out>, mode=<optimized out>) at /usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/modules/csync_owncloud.c:1312
(gdb) up
#5  0x000000388e20f34f in csync_vio_open (ctx=ctx@entry=0x7fffbc325e30, uri=0x7fffbca0da20 "ownclouds://my.server.com/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/markus_repo/scripts/backup_grass_mailman.sh", flags=flags@entry=449, mode=mode@entry=420) at /usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/src/vio/csync_vio.c:231
(gdb) up
#6  0x000000388e20c7fd in _csync_push_file (ctx=ctx@entry=0x7fffbc325e30, st=st@entry=0x7fffbc356e00) at /usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/src/csync_propagate.c:205
(gdb) up
#7  0x000000388e20ec6b in _csync_new_file (st=0x7fffbc356e00, ctx=0x7fffbc325e30) at /usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/src/csync_propagate.c:611
(gdb) up
#8  _csync_propagation_file_visitor (data=0x7fffbc325e30, obj=0x7fffbc356e00) at /usr/src/debug/ocsync-0.60.1/src/csync_propagate.c:1260
(gdb)
```

also reported as
* https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=867083
* https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=865686
